feedback.feedbackString: Heng should be written from left to right
Heng should be written from horizontal or positive slope

misClassify.feedbackString: Heng and HengGou looks similar. It's close, there is no hook at the end
misClassify.name: HengGou

misClassify.feedbackString: Heng and HengZhe looks similar. It's close, but keep the stroke straight
misClassify.name: HengZhe
